content: Please forgive us men, sister. We wouldn’t do this if we knew better. Make dua for us that we fulfill even a fraction of the honor that Allah ﷻ and His Messenger ﷺ have given you sisters in this beautiful deen. Inshallah, from here on out we intend that we will be with those sisters who are not having their rights fulfilled in the masajid, and we will not let our inaction be sufficient a response to the wrong actions of others.
